content.p: Rated 'Outstanding' by Ofsted, the School of Education has a long and successful history of providing Initial Teacher Education. Our partner schools are central to our success, we work with a large partnership of primary and secondary schools across the region. Featuring the latest news, events and development opportunities, our gateway acts as a bridge between the university and our partner schools - highlighting the opportunities available for teachers, mentors, coordinators and students to make the most of the partnership. The gateway also hosts all relevant resources that mentors and coordinators will need to support their students across their training year. Our masters programmes are designed to support both individual and organisational development and aim to deepen and refine your capacity to reflect critically upon your thinking and practice. We offer a number of flexible options including part-time and online study to fit in around your busy professional life. Find out more about our courses Follow us on Twitter Like us on Facebook Get in touch View all news View all events +44 (0)115 951 4543 uonschoolpartnership@nottingham.ac.uk
